overview_of_class: Laboratory techniques for studying chemical analysis and chemical reactions relevant to environmental or materials research. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on experiments. Must be taken concurrently with Chem 171-0.
name: Accelerated General Inorganic Chemistry Laboratory
title: WCAS CHEM 181-0-01 Accelerated General Inorganic Chemistry Laboratory
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 171-0.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Laboratory techniques for studying chemical analysis and chemical reactions relevant to environmental or materials research. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on experiments. Must be taken concurrently with Chem 171-0.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: AP Score of 3 or better; IB Score of 5 or better; qualifying score on Chemistry Placement Exam (available only to incoming first-year students).

Students enrolled in Chemistry 171-0 MUST also enroll in Chemistry 181-0.
Students enrolled in Chemistry 181-0 MUST also enroll in Chemistry 171-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Electronic Lab Notebook (details to be provided in course syllabus) ($30)
2. Approved laboratory safety eyewear ($10)
3. 100% Cotton laboratory coat ($45)

Items 2 and 3 to be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

subject: CHEM
